DOC.brief_summary: This open label , single-center study determine absolute bioavailability nasopharyngeal absorption PMI-150 ( intranasal ketamine ) 30 mg healthy adult volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Absolute Bioavailability Nasopharyngeal Absorption Intranasal Ketamine
DOC.detailed_description: To examine safety ass absolute bioavailability nasopharyngeal absorption PMI-150 30mg .
